text: (nabiyē!) ovunṭa daruṇu vada hiṁsā gena diya hæki ayama ovun kerehi (ādhipatyaya pavatvana men) avasāna dina dakvā ohu yavanu ætæyi obagē deviyan (ovunṭa) nivēdanayak nikut kirīma gæna (oba ovunṭa) matak kara denu mænava!niyata vaśayenma obagē deviyan dan̆ḍuvam dīmehi itāmat tīvravantayeki. namut niyata vaśayenma ohu itāmat kṣamā karanneku vaśayenda, karuṇāvantayeku vaśayenda siṭinnēya
